title: Leading trailers in the U.S. January 2020 , by weekly TV ad spend
summary: In general Spending in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 1917 to Bad_Boys_for_Life, and finally slightly increasing from Bad_Boys_for_Life to Dolittle.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 1917 and Bad_Boys_for_Life.
The highest Spending in million U.S. dollars, of value 10.41 was reached at Year 1917
The lowest Spending in million U.S. dollars, of value 4.18 was reported at Year Bad_Boys_for_Life
